channel.title: I Am So Lost!
channel.description:
I have a working source, that when I press Compile it says: "[i]Note: server.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.[/i]"
The thing is though... I don't have a clue what to do now. I don't know how to get the source onto a client, and I don't understand how to code.
Can someone at least help me with the Source to Client part?
[b]EDIT:[/b]
When I double click Run.Bat, it says: "[i]Loading... done Server Information: PORT: 43594 MAXPLAYERS: 1000[/i]"
So I'm guessing that means it's done or something.

item.title: I Am So Lost!
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Then search for server = and you should see something like:

anInt1171 = 1; aString1173 = ""; aString1174 = ""; server = "servernamehere"; aBoolean1176 = false; anInt1178 = -1; aClass19_1179 = new Class19(169); anInt1184 = 128; anInt1189 = -1;
change servernamehere to 127.0.0.1

then open the EGUI.java and where you see:

client.main(new String[] { " ", " ", " "
make it

client.main(new String[] { "your server ip", "localhost", "43594"

Read full topic

item.title: I Am So Lost!
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Alright, thanks for all the help!

Read full topic

item.title: I Am So Lost!
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

well then keep searching.

Also try searching for:

public final void init()

then scroll down a bit and u should see:

setserver("somethinghere", "43594");

Change somethinghere to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: I Am So Lost!
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

That means it compiled successfully.
Download a source and client. you can find many in the Downloads section.
Open the source, compile, run.
Open the client, open the client.java and search for setserver and server =
change the IP to 127.0.0.1
Open run.bat in clients folder and log on.

Read full topic
